column3: DWS: really one play, separate for now

ej,fregj101,M,cousd901,Call at 2B overturned $Bill Buckner was ruled out by 2B umpire Mark Johnson; the Red Sox objected to the call and 3B umpire Derryl Cousins overruled Johnson, saying that SS Ozzie Guillen had juggled the ball; White Sox manager Jim Fregosi ejected by Cousins; fans threw hundreds of free seat cushions onto the field, causing a 5-minute delay
$White Sox LF Daryl Boston made a leaping catch as he hurdled the low wall in foul territory and landed on top of some fans
ej,mcnaj801,M,evanj901,Dropped strike three Red Sox manager John McNamara ejected by HP umpire Jim Evans for arguing that the called strike three was dropped by catcher Ron Karkovice
ej,fregj101,M,kaisk901,Balls and strikes White Sox manager Jim Fregosi ejected by HP umpire Ken Kaiser
$Alfredo Griffin ran into his own batted ball
ej,fregj101,M,merrd901,HBP call $White Sox manager Fregosi ejected by 1B umpire Merrill for arguing HBP call on McGwire
ej,fregj101,M,cobld901,Fair/foul call on HR (Reversal) $White Sox manager Fregosi ejected by 1B umpire Coble when apparent home run hit by Calderon was reverses to foul ball by Coble
ej,larut101,M,mckej901,Balls and strikes Athletics manager Tony LaRussa ejected by HP umpire Jim McKean
